post.body: No! I need more stamps in my passport. But come to think about it, I should probably wait till summer b/c they are in the UK. Brrr.
Noooooooooo!
was it the Optima basket?
Yes, I'm man enough.
is reminded of the "get well, get well soon we want you to get well" song Elaine sang to J Peterman due to the many office celebrations 2day
is enjoying not one cake in the office, but two! And not the store-bought sheet cake crap - it's the REALLY good stuff.
just has a great chat with his colleague overseas. Don't they know they need to fly me over there for 1:1 chats? Phones are so impersonal.
is excited for "Rolleeanna". Congratulations!
thought "Lights in the Heights" was great even though I arrived late (hey, that rhymed!) Thanks @lieseldiesel!
headed to Christmas parties hosted by @lieseldiesel and @stevenwmurray
long run DID NOT go well plus I had my past haunt me in FB. Time to retreat for the afternoon.
is off and running.
in anticipation to my long run tomorrow, I will treat myself to something fantastic from Central Market. I'm worth it...
is already dreading a long run tomorrow morning.
is registering for CES in January! I hope some of you will be there?
has to miss the Houston Renewable Energy Network meeting and is sad to not see FB micro celeb Ravi Sankaran
can't believe NOLA residents didn't riot due to today's snow storm that the government didn't put a stop to.
gave in under pressure & guilt and has begun sharing.
just received a fantastic gift basket from my friends at Continental Airlines and will fend off my colleagues as I am not in a sharing mood.
decided to be a rebel and not evacuate to Corpus Christi due to the intense winter storm.
SNOWBALL FIGHT!!
fulfilled his commitment. Ye of little faith!
is off to give blood at the Direct Energy Blood Drive. Who's putting bets down I 1. Faint 2. Can't fill the bag or 3. Fulfill my commitment
asks, "So what are your favorite lines from Caddyshack?"
Dear Golf Channel: Thank you for airing Caddyshack yet again so I do not have to dwell on what the Today show deems as "news" from 2008.
Dear NBC: No one cares about what the overated cast of the Today show thinks are the best moments of 2008 so where is Chuck tonight?
did not run this AM b/c of sleet but I am still dreading the run tonight b/c it is SO darn cold.
just had lunch with FB micro celebrity Kerry Hunter and entourage.
is trapped in an undisclosed location attempting to update a web site so I do not have to touch it again until after Christmas.
is excited for Justin & Susannah on their Christmas engagement! I didn't know they had 'speed dating' on the missions field of Mongolia?
family Christmas drama has already begun. Let's see where this episode will take us.
wonders what this week will bring...
thinks Caddyshack is the perfect movie to watch with friends tonight. NaNaNaNaNa.....
got an urgent msg from my companies Help Desk re: a/c not working in Toronto office. It's Dec and they are in Canada - open a window!
did not count on so much drama the Friday before break.
has only one day of work left till holiday! Now to brace myself for the 'parental units'.
is @ FB micro celebrity Andy Russ' bday party. Who chose this place?
is running then pilates. Or is it pilate"ing"?
just misspelled a word in the Subject line of an email that went out to - well - everyone in the organization. AWESOME!
has a colleague running around the office quoting The Last Dragon. Something about "who is the master" and everyone is laughing but me.
